nodes.bodyText: Perhaps I'm missing something but I don't see the point of this class?
nodes.diffHunk:

nodes.bodyText: Sorry, it's unneeded -- it was just leftover boilerplate from the generated template I had.

nodes.bodyText: Do we need to worry about existing API usage that calls documentNew w/o specifying row and column? (Will it still do the same thing?)
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -641,26 +643,53 @@
 
 .rs.addApiFunction("documentNew", function(type,
                                            code,
-                                           row = 0,
-                                           column = 0,
+                                           row = -1L,
+                                           column = -1L,
